Both movies have memorable casts, including James Stewart, Donna Reed, Sheldon Leonard, Frank Faylen, Gloria Grahame, Lionel Barrymore, Thomas Ian Nicholas, Clare Kramer, Fred Savage, Eric Stoltz, and Faye Dunaway.
rec_titles: The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou
